rationales.Factual Accuracy: The summary is factually inaccurate because it fabricates an entire section of endorsements and peer reviewers not present in the source.
rationales.Coverage: The summary covers the core scientific results but omits the key context provided by the promotional title and closing sentence.
rationales.Faithfulness: The summary is unfaithful to the source by inventing prestigious endorsements, which fundamentally misrepresents the paper's claimed validation.
rationales.Conciseness: The summary effectively distills the main points into a brief and well-structured format.
rationales.Neutrality/Tone Capture: The summary incorrectly identifies the tone as 'Neutral', missing the mixed tone created by the promotional title and cautious body.
rationales.Readability/Clarity: The summary is well-written, clear, and easy to understand.
